title: Lara Trump
added: The [[Donald Trump 2020 presidential campaign|Trump campaign]] is paying Lara Trump $180,000 a year through the campaign manager Brad Parscale's private company, Parscale Strategy. Lara Trump has been a surrogate on the stump and taken on broad advisory roles.<ref>{{Cite news|last=Hakim|first=Danny|last2=Thrush|first2=Glenn|date=March 9, 2020|title=How the Trump Campaign Took Over the G.O.P.|language=en-US|work=The New York Times|url=https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/09/us/trump-campaign-brad-parscale.html|access-date=June 23, 2020|issn=0362-4331}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|last=Date|first=S. V.|date=April 17, 2020|title=Trump Campaign Secretly Paying $180,000 A Year To His Sonsâ€™ Significant Others|url=https://www.huffpost.com/entry/trump-secret-payments-sons-wife-girlfriend_n_5e9a1c46c5b635d25d6c747a|access-date=June 23, 2020|website=HuffPost|language=en}}</ref> In 2020, Lara Trump campaigned with the anti-Muslim far-right conspiracy theorist [[Laura Loomer]].<ref>{{Cite web|last=Behrmann|first=Savannah|title=Lara Trump campaigned with far-right candidate and conspiracy theorist Laura Loomer|url=https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/politics/elections/2020/09/02/lara-trump-campaigned-conspiracy-theorist-laura-loomer/5692753002/|access-date=2020-09-03|website=USA TODAY|language=en-US}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|title=Lara Trump campaigns with Jewish anti-Muslim activist Laura Loomer|url=https://www.haaretz.com/us-news/lara-trump-campaigns-with-jewish-anti-muslim-activist-laura-loomer-1.9125877|access-date=2020-09-03|website=Haaretz.com|language=en}}</ref>
